channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumping mattress in street, 22nd June
item.description:
101 Piedmont Rd dumping of mattress by tenants / landlord. This is not ok. Tell these people to stop it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgemore Path, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: HMO Dumping again in this area, 22nd June
item.description:
We are blighted by HMOs and the worst possible tenants and landlords in our area. They dump in Badgemore Path regularly. This should be on CCTV to deter and fines issued. Why not put these HMOs in parts of the borough like Greenwich, Eltham, Blackheath??? Why must we suffer it!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgemore Path, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The street sign ,ie Lewin Road is broken, 22nd June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Lewin Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Want trees planted, 22nd June
item.description:
Road barren of trees. Would like trees planted on the verge on the opposite side of the road to my home, 29 Mays Hill Rd. The House opposite, number 32,also wants it planted. I will water the new trees,v regularly. Indeed, for 200 metres down to Kingswood Road there is a need for extra trees, at least about ten, which we would keep well watered.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Mary's Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not emptied again, 22nd June
item.description:
Caretaker put bins out on Thursday to be emptied. Once again bin men not come. The rubbish smells and it’s attracting mice and rats which is disgusting. This is happening more often
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lullington Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping, 22nd June
item.description:

item.title: Construction work on Sundays and after 10pm during week, 22nd June
item.description:
The construction work for the road on Horseley down lane at the corner of Gainsford street is being conducted until 11pm/midnight during the week and all weekend both Saturday and Sundays and is extremely loud, bright, and disruptive please do something about this excessive noise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Gainsford Street, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401 bus stop, 22nd June
item.description:
A large quantity of rubbish has been dumped by the litter bin on Picardy Road Belvedere DA17 near the 401/469 Bus Stop, approximately 25 metres from the junction with Halt Robin Road. Would arrangements be put in place to remove the rubbish as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Picardy Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bin waste constantly left on side of road every week, 22nd June
item.description:
The bin collection system for Palace Square Flats has been a mess for over a year. Black bins are taken out by the bin men too early and left lining the pavement for a whole week — they overflow, attract foxes, rodents and spill rubbish all over the street. It's disgusting, unsafe, and needs sorting out urgently. The bin men should not be doing this it is ruining the area. Bromley Council, please fix this!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Vale, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assortment of rubbish piled up on the pavement Northfield Rd EN3, 22nd June
item.description:
Assortment of rubbish piled up on the pavement in Northfield Rd EN3 on the corner with Oxford Rd EN3. Northfield Rd EN3 is a regular dumping ground, cameras and heavy fines needed as same people dumping there regular and getting away with it!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxford Road, Southbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet
